info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 5:17PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Sierra County through 545 PM MDT... At 517 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arrey, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arrey and Caballo Lake. This includes Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 53 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
